**Transformation Steps:**
1. Find the position of the single Magenta cell in the input grid.
2. Transform this input grid by modifying it such that there are diagonals containing the Magenta color radiating out from the central Magenta cell in a repetitive "X" shaped pattern spanning along grid diagonals. The diagonals will alternately be Black and Magenta. This means moving outward from the center along any diagonal direction, you will encounter repeated alternating cells.
